Mailing Address: PO Box 22087Capri Post OfficeKelowna, BC     V1Y 9N9
Primary Contact: Shirley Goebel, Director of Dental Services
Service Details: - Provides dental care to those who are experiencing dental pain or infection and cannot afford treatment- Offers services to low-income families, seniors, those on income assistance or disability, the working poor, and the homeless
Eligibility: Low-income families, seniors, income assistance, disability benefits, the working poor and the homeless
How to Apply: - For an income assessment appointment call 1.800.789.0680 and leave a message- Please note: due to extremely high demand it may take several weeks to receive a call back
